subject: Baseball
Hiring and Promotion
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Mets are expected to take about three days to discuss the finalists to be their manager: Wally Backman, Terry Collins, Chip Hale and Bob Melvin.
snippet: The Mets are expected to take about three days to discuss the finalists to be their manager: Wally Backman, Terry Collins, Chip Hale and Bob Melvin.
